document.docAuthor: Hicks, Bill P. Stark and Matthew B.
document.masterDocTitle: New Records Of Winter Stoneflies (Plecoptera: Capniidae) In Mississippi

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New Records Of Winter Stoneflies (Plecoptera: Capniidae) In Mississippi

mods:name.mods:namePart: Hicks, Bill P. Stark and Matthew B.

subSubSection.paragraph: Nations et al. (2007) reported this species from Benton, Copiah, Covington, Franklin, Jefferson Davis, Lauderdale, Lincoln, Lowndes, Marion, Newton, Noxubee, Prentiss, Simpson, Tippah, Tishomingo, Union, Wilkinson and Yalobusha counties. Our recent collections include records from 35 sites; 29 of these represent new sites and new county records are presented for Greene, Itawamba, Lafayette, Lawrence, Monroe and Pike counties.
